Articles.Content: So I've been playing KSP for about 5 months maybe more and I've had all kinds of mods. The thing is I WANT MORE!!! I need some links to mods that are fully functional and will give me a lot of parts. I have gone through all the mods on ARM Pack [0.23.5] Mod Compatibility Thread and Community Mods and Plugins Library and I just can't seem to find enough parts that work and won't cause my game to crash. Just post your favorite mods and I will give them a try.

Home grown rocket parts is good, not many parts, though I would recommend trying the ones on the dev thread. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-23-Feb-12-HGR-New-spherical-pod-available KSO is also nice. Firespitter, Procedural fairings & Proc. Dynamics. Environmental Visual Effects for aesthetics.

Home grown rocket parts is good, not many parts, though I would recommend trying the ones on the dev thread. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-23-Feb-12-HGR-New-spherical-pod-available KSO is also nice. Firespitter, Procedural fairings & Proc. Dynamics. Environmental Visual Effects for aesthetics.

Thanks for the link I just downloaded the new parts. All the other parts you mentioned I already have or don't want.
You should try Infernal Robotics, making robots is always a good thing to do.

You should try Infernal Robotics, making robots is always a good thing to do.

I have all the well known mods. I'm looking for the less heard of mods
